DOC.brief_title: Randomized , Open Investigation Evaluating Efficacy Nobel Biocare SFB CFB Implants
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study determine safety efficacy parameter NobelActive Internal External implant make comparison NobelReplace Tapered Groovy implant place heal site . Safety : AEs Efficacy : - survival rate , - marginal bone resorption marginal bone level measurement , - soft tissue health maintenance via gingival index measurement , plaque index , papilla index .
DOC.criteria: The subject need implant support fixed restoration The subject sufficient bone volume density i.e . osseous architecture plan implant placement region sufficient receive implant diameter 3.5 mm length least 10 mm . The subject well implant site fulfill criterion immediate functional temporization within 24 h. The implant sit heal free infection . Alcohol drug abuse note patient record patient history . Health condition , permit surgical procedure . Reason believe treatment might negative effect subject 's total situation ( psychiatric problem ) , note patient record patient history . The subject able give her/his inform consent participate . The need bone augmentation implant installation obtain prosthetically correct implantation transversally . However , minor augmentation procedure cover expose thread interproximal / buccal grafting due deficient site exclusion criterion . Any disorder plan implant area previous tumor , chronic bone disease , previous irradiation . Uncontrolled diabetic exclude . Severe bruxism destructive habit . Immediate insertion ( e.g . placement implant immediately extraction ) constitute exclusion criterion .
